attachments.title: Trail Blazers Unveil New "Association" And "Icon" Nike Jerseys | Portland Trail Blazers
attachments.text: When the Portland Trail Blazers decided four years ago that they would at least consider changes to both their logo and traditional home and road uniforms, the team put together a focus group of fans ranging from long-time season ticket holders to new transplants to the Portland-metro area to gauge interest in potential tweaks.
attachments.fallback: Portland Trail Blazers: Trail Blazers Unveil New "Association" And "Icon" Nike Jerseys | Portland Trail Blazers
